affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Heroes
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of the targeted enemy hero. The enemy hero is slowed and attacked by the reflection for a short duration.
notes:
Reflections are untargetable, invulnerable illusions.
Reflections can only attack their source.
attrib:
REFLECTION DURATION: 2.5/3.5/4.5/5.5
REFLECTION DAMAGE: 40%/60%/80%/100%
MOVEMENT SLOW: 60%
ATTACK SLOW: 60
cmb:
50
22/18/14/10
lore: In the fractal prison of Foulfell, Terrorblade learned the truth of this old tale: you are your own worst enemy.  Now it is a lesson he teaches others.
name: terrorblade_reflection

desc: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.
attrib:
ILLUSION DURATION: 32
ILLUSION DAMAGE: 30%/40%/50%/60%
ILLUSION DAMAGE TAKEN: 425%
cmb:
80
16
lore: There's only one thing more dangerous than facing Terrorblade.  Facing MORE Terrrorblades!
name: terrorblade_conjure_image

desc: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack.
notes: Manta Style's cooldown time will be based on whether Terrorblade was in his ranged or melee form when the item was used.
attrib:
DURATION: 40/44/48/52
TRANSFORMATION TIME: 0.35
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.6
ATTACK RANGE: 550
BONUS DAMAGE: 20/40/60/80
MOVEMENT SPEED LOSS: 25
cmb:
50
140
lore: Temper, temper. The rage rises up and takes control.  Meet Terrorblade's own worst self.
name: terrorblade_metamorphosis

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Units
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
desc: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.
cmb:
200/100/0
120/80/40
lore: You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear.
name: terrorblade_sunder
